name: basic oxygen furnace dust to market for basic oxygen furnace dust, for recovery | basic oxygen furnace dust | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23429/documentation

This is a renaming activity. Its purpose is to link 'basic oxygen furnace dust' to the 'market for basic oxygen furnace dust, for recovery'. This represents the share of basic oxygen furnace dust that is recovered for use via internal (in iron and steelmaking) or external routes (e.g. cement making).Through this renaming, the by-product classification of the basic oxygen furnace dust is changed from 'waste' to 'recyclable material'.

Activity starts with the reception of 'basic oxygen furnace dust'.

Activity ends with the 'basic oxygen furnace dust, for recovery' being ready for transportation.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
